Dry air capacitance rate Includes simple anti-windup and limiting of the output to the range 0-1. More...

#include "spark.h"

Include dependency graph for caprateDry.cc:

Detailed Description

Dry air capacitance rate Includes simple anti-windup and limiting of the output to the range 0-1.

Abstract: Calculates capacitance rate for moist air heat exchanger.

Notes: Used in airhx.ob.

Acceptable input set: mAir = 1, w = 0.01

Interface variables
  • PORT mAir "Dry air mass flow rate" [kg_dryAir/s]
  • INIT = 1 MIN = 0 MAX = 1000 ;
  • PORT cap "Capacitance rate" [W/deg_C] ;
Functions
 cap = mAir * (CP_AIR + w * CP_VAP)


 cap  = cap_ratedry__cap( mAir  )


 mAir = cap_ratedry__mAir( cap )
